Title: An Act Converting the Mactan Barangay High School in Barangay Mactan, Lapu-Lapu City, into a National High School to be Known as the Mactan National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 520
An Act Converting the Mactan Barangay High School in Barangay Mactan, Lapu-Lapu City, into a National High School to be Known as the Mactan National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Section 1. The Mactan Barangay High School in Barangay Mactan, Lapu-lapu City, is converted into a national high school to be known as the Mactan National High School.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. The Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports is directed to take such steps as are necessary for the conversion and operation of the school and immediate implementation of this Act.
Section 3. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its share of national aid to local schools. The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 10, 1983
